page.title: 11LOCAL NEWS IN COLYTON part 2
page.content: Colyton Methodist Church helped to raise Â£1800 on behalf of the Christian Aid Fund.This surpassed all previous fund raising efforts. Colyton Cub pack have shamed motorists who uncaringly throw litter out of their car windows.18 boys filled two dustbin liners of rubbish collected from the hedgerows. Colyton is to be the latest "base" for the emergency radio communication network in the Axe Valley. An aerial will soon be erected at the back of the town hall. The project is to link important towns and villages in the area with smaller less important places. Colyton's Â£100 aerial is helping to link 9 of the Axe Valley parishes. This year Colyton has entered the Best Kept Village competition.The judges have not yet been to adjudicate this.
